history.proof: intros A v. unfold lt_depth. simpl. auto.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
L: Language

Goal:
forall (A : Formula) (v : nat), lt_depth A (forallH v A)

Premises:
Inductive Formula : Set := equal : Term -> Term -> Formula | atomic : forall r : Relations L, Terms (arity L (inl r)) -> Formula | impH : Formula -> Formula -> Formula | notH : Formula -> Formula | forallH : nat -> Formula -> Formula Arguments forallH _%nat_scope
lt_depth = fun A B : Formula => depth A < depth B : Formula -> Formula -> Prop
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
forallH : nat -> Formula -> Formula
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.D {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.N {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.I {
VectorDef.Forall_cons : forall (P : ?A -> Prop) (n : nat) (x : ?A) (v : VectorDef.t ?A n), P x -> VectorDef.Forall P v -> VectorDef.Forall P (VectorDef.cons ?A x n v) where ?A : [L : Language |- Type]
Inductive Forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> Prop := Forall_nil : VectorDef.Forall P (VectorDef.nil A) | Forall_cons : forall (n : nat) (x : A) (v : VectorDef.t A n), P x -> VectorDef.Forall P v -> VectorDef.Forall P (VectorDef.cons A x n v) Arguments VectorDef.Forall {A}%type_scope _%function_scope {n}%nat_scope Arguments VectorDef.Forall_nil {A}%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments VectorDef.Forall_cons {A}%type_scope _%function_scope {n}%nat_scope
existH = fun (x : nat) (A : Formula) => notH (forallH x (notH A)) : nat -> Formula -> Formula Arguments existH _%nat_scope
depthNot : forall A : Formula, lt_depth A (notH A)
depthImp1 : forall A B : Formula, lt_depth A (impH A B)
depthImp2 : forall A B : Formula, lt_depth B (impH A B)
map_nth : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (d : A) (n : nat), nth n (map f l) (f d) = f (nth n l d)
depth = fix depth (A : Formula) : nat := match A with | impH A0 B => S (Nat.max (depth A0) (depth B)) | notH A0 | forallH _ A0 => S (depth A0) | _ => 0 end : Formula -> nat
existT : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Type) (x : A), P x -> {x : A & P x}
map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> list A -> list B
prod_rec : forall (A B : Type) (P : A * B -> Set), (forall (a : A) (b : B), P (a, b)) -> forall p : A * B, P p
Ndigits.Ntestbit_Nbit : forall (a : BinNums.N) (n : nat), BinNat.N.testbit a (BinNat.N.of_nat n) = BinNat.N.testbit_nat a n
induction_ltof1 : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (P : A -> Set), (forall x : A, (forall y : A, ltof A f y x -> P y) -> P x) -> forall a : A, P a
fst = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (x, _) := p in x : forall A B : Type, A * B -> A Arguments fst {A B}%type_scope
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments snd {A B}%type_scope
language : forall Relations Functions : Set, (Relations + Functions -> nat) -> Language
Inductive sigT (A : Type) (P : A -> Type) : Type := existT : forall x : A, P x -> {x : A & P x} Arguments sigT [A]%type_scope _%type_scope Arguments existT [A]%type_scope _%function_scope
Inductive sig (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : Type := exist : forall x : A, P x -> {x : A | P x} Arguments sig [A]%type_scope _%type_scope Arguments exist [A]%type_scope _%function_scope
Inductive t (A : Type) : nat -> Type := nil : VectorDef.t A 0 | cons : A -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t A (S n) Arguments VectorDef.t _%type_scope _%nat_scope Arguments VectorDef.nil _%type_scope Arguments VectorDef.cons _%type_scope _ _%nat_scope
Ndigits.Nand_semantics : forall (a a' : BinNums.N) (n : nat), BinNat.N.testbit_nat (BinNat.N.land a a') n = (BinNat.N.testbit_nat a n && BinNat.N.testbit_nat a' n)%bool
Acc_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (P : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, (forall y : A, R y x -> Acc R y) -> (forall y : A, R y x -> P y) -> P x) -> forall x : A, Acc R x -> P x
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, P l
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Functions = fun l : Language => let (Relations, Functions, _) := l in Functions : Language -> Set
Relations = fun l : Language => let (Relations, Functions, _) := l in Relations : Language -> Set
Nat.central_induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, A z -> (forall n : nat, A n <-> A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
VectorDef.cons : forall A : Type, A -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t A (S n)
Inductive prod (A B : Type) : Type := pair : A -> B -> A * B Arguments prod (_ _)%type_scope Arguments pair {A B}%type_scope
Nat.case_analysis : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A 0 -> (forall n : nat, A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
Nat.bi_induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A 0 -> (forall n : nat, A n <-> A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
nth : forall A : Type, nat -> list A -> A -> A
firstn : forall A : Type, nat -> list A -> list A
Inductive sum (A B : Type) : Type := inl : A -> A + B | inr : B -> A + B Arguments sum (_ _)%type_scope Arguments inl {A B}%type_scope, [A] _ _ Arguments inr {A B}%type_scope, _ [B] _
Inductive Acc (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (x : A) : Prop := Acc_intro : (forall y : A, R y x -> Acc R y) -> Acc R x Arguments Acc [A]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Acc_intro [A]%type_scope [R]%function_scope _ _%function_scope
Record Language : Type := language { Relations : Set; Functions : Set; arity : Relations + Functions -> nat } Arguments language (_ _)%type_scope _%function_scope
sumbool_rec : forall (A B : Prop) (P : {A} + {B} -> Set), (forall a : A, P (left a)) -> (forall b : B, P (right b)) -> forall s : {A} + {B}, P s
firstn_cons : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (a : A) (l : list A), firstn (S n) (a :: l) = a :: firstn n l
Formula_rec : forall P : Formula -> Set, (forall t t0 : Term, P (equal t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic r t)) -> (forall f1 : Formula, P f1 -> forall f2 : Formula, P f2 -> P (impH f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : Formula, P f2 -> P (notH f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : Formula), P f3 -> P (forallH n f3)) -> forall f4 : Formula, P f4
Formula_ind : forall P : Formula -> Prop, (forall t t0 : Term, P (equal t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic r t)) -> (forall f1 : Formula, P f1 -> forall f2 : Formula, P f2 -> P (impH f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : Formula, P f2 -> P (notH f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : Formula), P f3 -> P (forallH n f3)) -> forall f4 : Formula, P f4

```coq
intros A v. unfold lt_depth. simpl. auto.
Qed.```
